Text: RE Line Rupture at South Wapiti Cc This is what I know so far the South Wapiti inlet header blew up The inspection team is going out today to survey the damage From speaking to Ron Johnson operator S Wapiti he feels the damage is significant thus many parts and valves will have to be changed out Depending on crews and availability of parts the plant will be zero for at least days if not until mid next week South Wapiti produces approximately of Iroquois Creek meter thus GJ will be off until the plant is back up I will keep you informed on any new information Des Original Message From Lord Sandra ENRON Sent Thursday July PM To Cameron Terry Danforth Karen Burwash Carol Tourigny Sheri Cc Miller John D Rogers Mark MacPherson John Cameron Reginald Desrae Nicholson Subject Line Rupture at South Wapiti There has been a line rupture at the South Wapiti plant which has resulted in about mmcf off the NOVA system Des doesnt have any details as yet other than we will likely lose about gj of production today Her info so far says that no one was hurt but the fire trucks are there Well keep you posted
